text: (Napiye!) Um kanavil avarkalai(t tokaiyil) umakkuk kuraivakak kanpittataiyum, avarkalai umakku atikamakak kanpittiruntal, ninkal tairiyam irantu (por natattum) kariyattil ninkal (oruvarukkoruvar pinankit)tarkkam ceytu kontiruntiruppirkal enpataiyum ninaivu kuruviraka! Eninum (appati natantuvitamal unkalai) allah kapparrinan; niccayamaka avan ullankalil ullavarrai aripavan
